name: HarryPotterFacts
0:
”Alexa, give me a fact from the Wizarding World”
”Give me a Harry Potter fact from the Wizarding World”
”Give me a fact about Harry Potter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the wizarding world
des: This skill gives users fun facts about Harry Potter! It is an exciting and easy way to learn something new about the wizarding world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
